title: Autumn apple pie
ingredients: ['1 (375g) packet ready rolled shortcrust pastry sheets', '750g thinly sliced apples', '1 lemon, juiced', '110g light brown soft sugar', '100g caster sugar', '2 teaspoons ground cinnamon', '1/4 teaspoon freshly grated nutmeg', '3 tablespoons plain flour', '50g unsalted butter, chilled and diced', '9 toffees, unwrapped and quartered', '1 tablespoon caster sugar']
